there seems to be a great deal of disagreement on the 'Pitch' cards.
  
   
1. Force of WIll is the best. Im glad everyone agrees on that.
  
2. Foil is a bad Force of Will. Of course, freaking COUNTERSPELL, DAZE, and DISPEL are also bad Force of Wills, but STILL. It causes you to pitch 2 cards instead of one, meaning you better be countering something deadly, or your down c.a. using a Blue Counterspell for free. that's a bad place to be.
  
3. I looked up the rest of Force of Will's cycle today, and I would rank them as 2 ties, for 2nd and 3rd place. Contagion you can maindeck in a deck without Dark Ritual and risk pretending it doesn't have the free-spell rider. Maybe. But Pyrokinesis can kill more things if they're small, or one bigger thing than Contagion. That's why I give them the tie. Scars of the Veteran is a much needed decent rare port of Healing Salve- doing the same thing, only actually good enough to matter. Can save you from 2 or even 3 burn spells in a pinch.
